title: Quote 1
copy:
"The mind is everything. What you think you become."

- Buddha

title: Quote 2
copy:
“Meditation is a way for nourishing and blossoming the divinity within you.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 3
copy:
"This moment, here, is inseparable from who you are at the deepest level."

- Eckhart Tolle

title: Quote 4
copy:
“Feelings come and go like clouds in a windy sky. Conscious breathing is my anchor.”

- Thich Nhat Hanh

title: Quote 5
copy:
“If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 6
copy:
"If
the ocean
can calm itself,
so can you.
We
are both
salt water
mixed with
air."

- Nayyirah Waheed

title: Quote 7
copy:
“Looking at beauty in the world, is the first step of purifying the mind.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 8
copy:
"The future is always beginning now."

- Mark Strand

title: Quote 9
copy:
“To understand the immeasurable, the mind must be extraordinarily quiet, still.”

- Jiddu Krishnamurti

title: Quote 10
copy:
“Sometimes you need to sit lonely on the floor in a quiet room in order to hear your own voice and not let it drown in the noise of others.”

- Charlotte Eriksson

title: Quote 11
copy:
“An awake heart is like a sky that pours light.”

- Hafiz

title: Quote 12
copy:
“Beautify your inner dialogue. Beautify your inner world with love light and compassion. Life will be beautiful.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 13
copy:
"A simple practice. Accept whatever arises - within or without."

- Eckhart Tolle

title: Quote 14
copy:
"If you just sit and observe, you will see how restless your mind is. If you try to calm it, it only makes it worse, but over time it does calm, and when it does, there's room to hear more subtle things--that's when your intuition starts to blossom and you start to see things more clearly and be in the present more. Your mind just slows down, and you see a tremendous expanse in the moment. You see so much more than you could see before."

- Steve Jobs

title: Quote 15
copy:
“A woman is human.

She is not better, wiser, stronger, more intelligent, more creative, or more responsible than a man.

Likewise, she is never less.

Equality is a given.

A woman is human.”

- Vera Nazarian

title: Quote 16
copy:
"Give your attention to the experience of seeing rather than to the object seen and you will find yourself everywhere."

- Rupert Spira

title: Quote 17
copy:
“You exist in time, but you belong to
eternity- You are a penetration of eternity into the world of time-You are
deathless, living in a body of death- Your consciousness knows no death, no
birth- It is only your body that is born and dies-But you are not aware of
your consciousness-You are not conscious of your consciousness-And that is the whole art of meditation;Becoming conscious of consciousness itself.”

- Osho

title: Quote 18
copy:
“Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in Eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.”

- Voltaire

title: Quote 19
copy:
"Suffering usually relates to wanting things to be different than they are." 

- Allan Lokos

title: Quote 20
copy:
“Self-observation is the first step of inner unfolding.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 21
copy:
“Your thoughts are your message to the world. Just as the rays are the messages of the Sun.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 22
copy:
“You asked me how to get out of the finite dimensions when I feel like it. I certainly don't use logic when I do it. Logic's the first thing you have to get rid of.”

- J.D. Salinger

title: Quote 23
copy:
“Have love for your inner Self and everything else is done for you.”

- Amit Ray

title: Quote 24
copy:
"Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most."

- Buddha
